io.shardingsphere.core.rule

类 ShardingRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.shardingsphere.core.rule.ShardingRule

  • public final class ShardingRule
extends Object
    Databases and tables sharding rule configuration.

    zhangliang, maxiaoguang

        public ShardingStrategy getDatabaseShardingStrategy(TableRule tableRule)
        Get database sharding strategy.

        Use default database sharding strategy if not found.

        参数:
        tableRule - table rule
        返回:
        database sharding strategy
